title: Octopuses Have a Favorite Arm
description:
Right now, LMNT is offering SciShow viewers a free sample pack with any order. That’s 8 single serving packets free with any LMNT order. It’s a great way to try all 8 flavors or share with a friend! Get yours at https://DrinkLMNT.com/SciShow.

Most humans might be right-handed, but plenty of other animals have a preferred hand (or whatever they've got instead of hands) too. The more general term is lateralization, and it's found in everything from kangaroos to octopuses.

Hosted by: Reid Reimers (he/him)
